issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
When building for an Android device, the com.wwl.canvas module gives the following warning:

The module com.wwl.canvas does not support the ABI: x86

Please fix this, as I cannot release my app without this support.
fields.summary: Android canvas module does not support the ABI x86
fields.environment: Titanium SDK 3.2.2 running on Mac OS X 10.9.3

comments.body: I would suggest you to contact the module owner regarding the support.
